name: Alien Rescue Force (A.R.F)
description:
A distant galaxy is in peril! Planets are exploding due to a mysterious power and only one thing can save the inhabitants – the Alien Rescue Force!

Use your Alien Evacuation Launch Device to guide a variety of friendly aliens into escape pods and away to safety. This will require both precision and puzzle solving ability to overcome obstacles such as moving platforms, trampolines and even large predators! Luckily you have a range of power ups to help you such as parachutes and guided rocket packs.

User Comments:
“A unique and rewarding game. The power ups add a whole new dimension of fun!”

“I love the boss levels!!! Was great fun using the rocket pack to send him packing.”

“Reminded me a little of Angry Birds and Fragger but much more varied!”

“Starts off simple enough but gets much trickier by the end – particularly if you want 3 stars on every level! ”
